issue.title: [C++][Python] Add basic ORC support to the pyarrow.datasets API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13572](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13572). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is significant interest in having directory-partitioned ORC support from users of Dask.  Since Dask already leverages the pyarrow.datasets API for parquet-formatted data, having ORC support through the same pyarrow API would be extremely useful.
